data.title: Gene Hackman: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Gene Hackman: Check out the list of all Gene Hackman movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Gene Hackman news on Times of India.
data.text:
Grammy-winning songwriter Shirley Eikhard passes away at 67

ANI / Dec 18, 2022, 13:08 (IST)

Songwriter behind Bonnie Raitt's Grammy-winning 1991 hit 'Something to Talk About,' Shirley Eikhard passed away at 67 on Thursday at Headwaters Health Care Centre in Orangeville, Ontario due to cancer complications.

Martin Scorsese jokingly confirms making Tumblr mafia movie 'Goncharov'

ANI / Nov 27, 2022, 16:14 (IST)

American filmmaker Martin Scorsese has proved that he is the king of comedy by finally giving the confirmation that he was the one who made the Tumblr mafia movie 'Goncharov'.

Owen Wilson used to think about death a lot

IANS / Aug 21, 2021, 11:23 (IST)

Hollywood star Owen Wilson, who attempted suicide in August 2007, started to think about death after turning 11, but he never spoke to his parents about it.

'The French Connection' producer Philip D'Antoni passes away at 89

PTI / Apr 24, 2018, 13:39 (IST)

Philip D'Antoni, who won an Oscar for his work on 'The French Connection', has passed away.

Susan Sarandon: Paul Newman gave me part of his salary

PTI / Mar 09, 2018, 13:51 (IST)

Hollywood veteran Susan Sarandon has revealed that her 'Twilight' co-star Paul Newman once gave a part of his salary to her after he came to know that she was being paid less than the male leads in the films.

Hollywood actors who are 80 and still going strong

TNN / Oct 04, 2014, 00:00 (IST)

With Brigitte Bardot turning 80 last week, she joined the elite club of yesteryear stars who have reached the milestone in recent years and are not shying away from the limelight.

Superman is supercool at 75

TNN / Jun 13, 2013, 10:44 (IST)

As a brand new Superman gears up to save the Earth (once again) and sizzle the box office this Friday, we take a little trip down memory lane

Celebrities who were also race drivers

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jul 31, 2024, 14:20 (IST)

Many celebrities have transitioned from Hollywood to the racetrack, passionately pursuing motorsports alongside their entertainment careers. Notable names include James Dean, Paul Newman, Steve McQueen, and Patrick Dempsey. These personalities have competed in prestigious races, showcasing their love for speed and skill on the track. Their endeavors highlight a deep connection between pop culture and racing sports.

Nicholas Hoult is playing Lex Luthor in 'Superman: Legacy', confirms James Gunn

PTI / Dec 13, 2023, 16:10 (IST)

Filmmaker James Gunn confirms Nicholas Hoult as Lex Luthor in 'Superman: Legacy' alongside David Corenswet as Superman/Clark Kent and Rachel Brosnahan as Lois Lane. The cast also includes Nathan Fillion, Isabela Merced, Edi Gathegi, Anthony Carrigan, Skyler Gisondo, and Sara Sampaio. The film is set to release on July 11, 2025.

Oscar-winning director, William Friedkin dies at 87

ANI / Aug 08, 2023, 12:26 (IST)

On Monday, William Friedkin, the Oscar-winning director of 'The French Connection' and 'The Exorcist', passed away in Los Angeles .

Shubhaavi Choksey reveals Bollywood and Hollywood has had a very big influence in her life

etimes.in / Jan 17, 2023, 17:31 (IST)

Shubhaavi Choksey, who is currently seen in Bade Acche Lagte Hain 2 revealed how Hollywood and Bollywood have been a huge influence in her life. She also named her favourite actors from Hollywood and Bollywood.

'The Exorcist' director William Friedkin passes away at 87

Reuters / Aug 08, 2023, 12:19 (IST)

William Friedkin, the director of celebrated Hollywood films such as 'The French Connection' and 'The Exorcist', died on August 16 at the age of 87. Friedkin won five Academy Awards for The French Connection as the best picture, director, and actor for Gene Hackman. Upon its release, The Exorcist shocked movie-goers with its unflinching portrayal of demonic possession.

Jennifer Lawrence to play Hollywood talent agent Sue Mengers in biopic

PTI / Aug 11, 2021, 21:02 (IST)

Oscar-winner Jennifer Lawrence is set to play famous Hollywood talent agent Sue Mengers in a biopic that has 'The Great Beauty' helmer Paolo Sorrentino attached as a director. The biopic has sparked a bidding war between OTT streamers Collider reported.

Snail mail’s the ‘write’ choice for Hollywood

TNN / Apr 05, 2014, 00:00 (IST)

Handwritten letters have their own charm, and whoever has written them even once in their lives will admit it.
